All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Main class that creates and start the Continuous Integration server
CmdTask
Command task that stores a console command as a string to later be executed (through the "execute" method).
ContinuousIntegrationServer
Skeleton of a ContinuousIntegrationServer which acts as webhook
EmptyTask
Empty task to use in place of other tasks during debugging
FileUtils
Class containing static methods dealing with file management.
Git
Class containing static methods dealing with git actions.
Gradle
Class containing static methods dealing with gradle actions.
HttpTask
Define a type of task that stores all information needed to later send an HTTP request.
JavaTask
A task type that executes internal java code instead of a console command
Notification
Class containing static methods dealing with notifications.
SimpleApp
Class containing static methods used for testing.
Systemd
Class containing static methods dealing with systemd systems.
Task
Abstract class representing a single task to be executed in the future
TaskResult
TaskResults store the results of executing a task.
Tasks
Class containing the two static method to build and test a commit from its branch and hash.
Website
Class containing static methods to generate website content
